author: bridge-bot
content: <CarlBeek> What exactly are you looking to do with the final SRS. In this case there isn't really a preparation phase asside for giving the community enough time for everyone to verify that their contribution was included. The KZG libraries used by the EL&CL clients ingest the SRS in Lagrange form, but this is a simple transformation that can be done by the client teams and verified by anyone.
